testcase.name: to test login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on login page..........................................passed When user enters valid username "Admin".....................................passed And User enters valid password "admin123"...................................passed And User clicks on button submit............................................passed Then User should see username as "Welcome"..................................passed

testcase.name: to test login with valid credentials 3
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on login page..........................................passed When user enters invalid username "Mayur"...................................passed And User enters invalid password "Mayur"....................................passed And User clicks on button submit............................................passed Then User should see message "Invalid credentials"..........................passed
